channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report X-2024071924
item.description:
Report X-2024071924

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-01T15:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-23
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Discovered during the OB sort. Cap on one bottle was loose and seal was defective, causing liquid to spill into and out of container. Other bottles contaminated.
